name: Passing On (Brontosaurus G, charles4255)
description:
An exploratory platformer about finding your roots. Explore the underground and meet strange individuals. Gain items to explore these mysterious catacombs in fun new ways. Navigate the world to eventually find the root of the mystery.

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

Shift - Run

Esc - Pause

R - Reset

This game was submitted for the Global Game Jam 2023 in Seattle.

GGJ 2023 Seattle Site
